description.value:
Requirements Trained in Crafting; you have the item and the prerequisite feats for the item; you have the appropriate proficiency to craft the item.

You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heroic-crafting.heroic-crafting-actions.Item.LkGmdi4CzHghHhjA]{Begin a Project} to reverse-engineer the item’s formula. This destroys the item, but leaves behind fragments which can be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heroic-crafting.heroic-crafting-actions.Item.DfvGFDHV7pYIT7ct]{Salvaged} for 50% of the item’s value. To do this, a character must be trained in Crafting.
